moreBlocks.articles:
• Bailey & Galyen, Attorneys at Law
    Bailey & Galyen is one of the largest consumer law firms in Texas and has recovered many millions of dollars on behalf of injured people in Texas, Florida and Missouri.
  • About Our Firm
    The Houston / Dallas law firm of Bailey & Galyen is among the largest "consumer law firms" in the state of Texas with over 30 attorneys and multiple offices across Texas as well as in Florida and Missouri.
  • Bailey & Galyen
    At Bailey & Galyen, our experienced lawyers practice in wide ranging areas of the law.
  • Our Practice Areas
    Bailey & Galyen is one of the "consumer law firms" in the state of Texas with an expanding, nationwide practice currently serving clients throughout Texas, Florida and Missouri.

description:
Whatever legal challenge you face - DUI/DWI, a difficult divorce, an injury in a truck accident or any of our 13 practice areas - the law firm of Bailey & Galyen in Plano, Texas, has one mission: solving your legal puzzle.™

In the Plano area, one all-purpose law office distinguishes itself with its scope of practice and depth of legal experience: Bailey & Galyen.

Our law office works to untangle all the knotty issues Texans face: personal injury, divorce and child custody, traffic tickets, IRS issues, estate planning, Chapter 7 and 13 bankruptcy, Social Security claims, tax disputes, immigration, and business, corporate, and employer concerns.

We work to provide you with big firm results, but in the approachable atmosphere of a smaller firm. We use the phrase "100 percent law firm" because when representing you, 100 percent is what we give.

This ethic manifests itself in our law firm's outcomes. We commonly win judgments for injured clients in excess of $1 million. A single class action suit against a pharmaceutical company won $108 million for our clients. The website GetLegal.com named us "Eminent Law Firm of the Year."

Many of our attorneys are board certified by the state of Texas in the areas of criminal law, family law and personal injury.

We work to be both affordable and convenient to you. We offer free initial consultations, payment by credit card, hospital and home visits, and 24-hour telephone service. We have Spanish-speaking attorneys.

Relationships are important to us. We want to earn clients' confidence by doing quality work. If experience and expertise plus a track record of positive outcomes are important to you in picking an attorney, consider the lawyers of Bailey & Galyen.
